name: Froggy, No!
description:
Small Frog, Huge Dominos

Developed for GameDev Weekend 2021 GameJam (theme: Small Hero, Huge Powers) facilitated by AAIPS.

Game Development By Bernardo Mota and Rafael Palma.

The frog can create dominos and, one by one, the dominos will grow in size. Press the red button!

https://github.com/neurodraft/GameDev-Weekend-2021-GameJam
